name: Fancy Color - Paint by Number
description:
Enjoy and paint 10,000+ coloring pictures in this adult coloring book game! Nice art coloring pages are updated for you to play!

Fancy Color-Color By Number provide you with more than 20+ color categories. You will be able to paint by number:
Character / Beast / Flower / Heart / Scenery / Interior / Animal / Mandala / Skeleton / Food / Princess / Fairy / Mermaid / Dog / Cat / Butterfly / Holidays / Quote .....

Coloring games has never been so easy, you can color a pictures on anytime, anywhere.

Subscription pricing and terms：
In Fancy Color, we offer you the following two subscription options:
1. A weekly subscription costing $4.89 (or equivalent in your currency) per week.
2. A monthly subscription costing $9.99 (or equivalent in your currency) per month.
2. A monthly subscription costing $69.99 (or equivalent in your currency) per year after a 3-day free trial period.
After buying the subscriptions, you will remove the non-optional banner and interstitial adverts from the game. In addition, you'll get unlimited hints and unlimited buckets, and remove watermarks from all completed pictures.

Open this coloring book, and start to paint your artwork. Don't forget to share your masterpiece with your friend and family!

Beautiful art painting pictures and beautiful collections are updated every day for you to relax your mind! Now, start exploring free pictures and enjoy number painting in your coloring book!

Start the happy coloring experience now!
